meanings.sent1: My mamies always bake delicious cookies for me.

meanings.sent3: During the family reunion, all the mamies shared their favorite recipes.
meanings.sent4: The wisdom of our mamies is a treasure passed down through generations.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of the mamies echoed through the house during the holiday gathering.
